lead_paragraph: Kenyan forces pulled out of two towns in southern Somalia on Tuesday, and Islamist extremists moved into one of them.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Somalia: Kenyan Troops Leave 2 Towns

snippet: Kenyan forces pulled out of two towns in southern Somalia on Tuesday, and Islamist extremists moved into one of them.
abstract: Kenyan military pulls out of Somalia after attack by Shabab militants reportedly killed scores of Kenyan peacekeepers.
